text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/05eb5b9cae123b138bbd23cc77e50657ece6b4ad|patch 8.2.1693: "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight>
patch 8.2.1693: "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight

Problem:    "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight.
Solution:   Check the "sg_cleared" flag. (Maxim Kim, closes #6956,
            closes #4405)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1693: "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight · vim/vim@05eb5b9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1693: "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight · vim/vim@05eb5b9
attachments.text: Problem: "hi def" does not work for cleared highlight. Solution: Check the "sg_cleared" flag. (Maxim Kim, closes #6956, closes #4405)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5e654230777ad21363a929dce3cfe0387da031a7|patch 8.2.1691: Vim9: list<any> is not accepted where list<number> is…>
patch 8.2.1691: Vim9: list is not accepted where list is expected

Problem:    Vim9: list is not accepted where list is expected.
Solution:   Add functions to allocate and free a type_T, use it in
            ISN_CHECKTYPE. (closes #6959)

patch 8.2.1690: text properties not adjusted for "I" in Visual block mode

Solution:   Call inserted_bytes().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ad5e5631c5dc93a50bbe637be254c5e9968848ea|patch 8.2.1689: 'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent>
patch 8.2.1689: 'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent

Problem:    'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent.
Solution:   Also draw the column when draw_state is WL_BRI or WL_SBR.
            (Alexey Demin, closes #6948, closes #6619)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1689: 'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent · vim/vim@ad5e563
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1689: 'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent · vim/vim@ad5e563
attachments.text: Problem: 'colorcolumn' doesn't show in indent. Solution: Also draw the column when draw_state is WL_BRI or WL_SBR. (Alexey Demin, closes #6948, closes #6619)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c8f12c9856df58c760fe54d81b2ec5ed4dcaffd6|patch 8.2.1688: increment/decrement removes text property>
patch 8.2.1688: increment/decrement removes text property

Problem:    Increment/decrement removes text property.
Solution:   Insert the new number before deleting the old one. (closes #6962)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1688: increment/decrement removes text property · vim/vim@c8f12c9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1688: increment/decrement removes text property · vim/vim@c8f12c9
attachments.text: Problem: Increment/decrement removes text property. Solution: Insert the new number before deleting the old one. (closes #6962)
